pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks to the Vice President of the United States, Mike Pence | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the Vice President of the United States, Mike Pence. The Prime Minister and the Vice President discussed the North American Free Trade Agreement, the U.S.’s Section 232 investigation into steel and aluminum imports, as well as the upcoming G7 Leaders’ Summit.
